data.title: Discover Theresa Russell Net Worth in 2024: Detailed Analysis
data.meta_description: Discover Theresa Russell net worth in 2024, including career highlights, earnings, and financial insights. Join RachelParris for the latest updates.
data.text:
Theresa Russell net worth in 2024 is a hot topic. Join RachelParris as we dive into the financial details of this talented actress and leading comedy film earner.

Quick Facts

FACTDETAILReal NameTheresa Lynn PaupPopular NameTheresa RussellGenderFemaleBirth DateMarch 20, 1957Age67ParentsCarole Platt, Jerry Russell PaupSiblings2 Half-siblingsBirthplaceSan Diego, CaliforniaNationalityAmericanEthnicityN/AEducation Burbank High School, Lee Strasberg Theatre & Film InstituteMarital StatusDivorcedSexual OrientationStraightWife/SpouseNicolas Roeg (1982-2002)ChildrenStatten Roeg, Maximillian RoegDatingN/ANet Worth$5 millionSource of WealthActing, ModelingHeight5 ft 6 in (1.67 m)

What is the Net Worth Of Theresa Russell in 2024?

As of 2024, Theresa Russell’s net worth is estimated to be $5 million.

This places her above Denise Richards ($4 million) and Jennifer Taylor ($3 million).

Theresa’s wealth stems primarily from her prolific acting career, which spans over four decades and includes more than 50 feature films.

Her consistent presence in both mainstream and independent films has significantly contributed to her financial success.

Theresa Russell Finance Overview

Early Life and Career Beginnings

Theresa Russell was born in San Diego, California, and grew up in Burbank. She had a challenging childhood marked by poverty.

Despite these hardships, she transitioned from modeling at the age of 12 to acting by 19, making her film debut in The Last Tycoon.

Her early career was influenced significantly by her modeling background, which provided the initial financial stability and exposure needed to break into the acting industry.

Major Film Roles and Earnings

Russell’s film career took off with her performance in Straight Time opposite Dustin Hoffman. She gained further acclaim in Bad Timing, directed by her future husband, Nicolas Roeg.

This collaboration led to several other projects, including Eureka and Track 29. Her role in Black Widow as a seductive serial killer brought her significant commercial attention and boosted her earnings.

In addition to these films, Russell appeared in Spider-Man 3 and Wild Things, both of which contributed substantially to her net worth.

Her diverse filmography, which spans both mainstream hits and independent gems, showcases her versatility and ability to consistently earn from a variety of roles.

Television Appearances and Impact on Net Worth

She has also made notable appearances on television, enhancing her financial portfolio.

She starred in episodes of popular series such as Law & Order: Criminal Intent, Fringe, and Cold Case. These roles, though sometimes brief, helped maintain her presence in the entertainment industry and provided additional income streams.

Awards and Recognitions

Russell’s talent has been recognized with several awards. She won Best Actress at the Mystfest in 1988 and again at the Method Fest in 2009.

These accolades not only highlight her acting prowess but also contribute to her marketability and earning potential in the industry.

Personal Life and Financial Management

Theresa Russell’s personal life has seen its ups and downs. She married Nicolas Roeg in 1982, and their partnership influenced much of her career.

They divorced in 2002. Despite personal challenges, Russell has managed her finances well.

Her investments and the income from her prolific acting career have secured her a net worth of $5 million. Additionally, her involvement in philanthropic activities showcases her commitment to giving back to the community.

Later Career and Recent Projects

In recent years, Russell has continued to work in both film and television. She appeared in Empire Falls, an HBO mini-series, and had roles in independent films like Jolene.

Her performance in The Believer further solidified her reputation as a talented actress. Looking forward, any upcoming projects will likely continue to enhance her net worth.

Theresa Russell’s Legacy and Influence in Hollywood

She has made significant contributions to the film industry. Her extensive filmography and ability to take on diverse roles have influenced many aspiring actors.

Her legacy is marked by her collaboration with iconic directors and her performances in critically acclaimed films. Russell’s impact on Hollywood is lasting, and her financial success is a testament to her enduring talent.

FAQs About Theresa Russell

Who is Theresa Russell?

She is an American actress known for her roles in movies like Black Widow and Insignificance. She’s celebrated for her versatility and powerful performances.

When was she born?

She was born on March 20, 1957. This makes her a Pisces!

What are some of her notable films?

Some of her notable films include Black Widow, Insignificance, The Razor’s Edge, Kafka, and Wild Things. She has a knack for choosing unique and compelling roles.

Has she won any awards?

Yes, she has been nominated for various awards throughout her career, including the Independent Spirit Award for Best Female Lead. She won the Best Actress award at the Mystfest for her role in Whore.

Who is she married to?

She was married to English director Nicolas Roeg. They got married in 1982 and had two children together. Roeg passed away in 2018.

Does she have children?

Yes, she has two children with her late husband Nicolas Roeg. Their names are Max and Statten.

Where is she from?

She was born in San Diego, California. She grew up there and later moved to Los Angeles to pursue her acting career.

What was her first film?

Her first film was The Last Tycoon (1976), where she played the role of Cecilia Brady. It was a significant start to her career, working alongside big names like Robert De Niro and Jack Nicholson.

What is she doing now?

She continues to act and has taken on various roles in both films and television. She also spends time focusing on personal projects and family.

You can follow her on social media platforms like Twitter and Instagram to get the latest updates on her projects and personal life.

Conclusion

In conclusion, Theresa Russell’s net worth in 2024 stands at $5 million, showcasing a successful career built over decades.

From her early days in modeling to becoming a respected actress in both mainstream and independent films, Russell’s journey is impressive.
